sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that \(f \), \(g \), and \(h \) are in continued proportion. Then prove the following.
\[
	\frac{f }{h } = \frac{2 f ^2 - 4 fg + 2 g ^2}{2 g ^2 - 4 gh + 2 h ^2}
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{
Given that $f $, $g $, and $h $ are in continued proportion. So, we can write}$$
\[
	\frac{f }{g } = \frac{g }{h } = i \textrm{ (assumption)}
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow f = \input[s2v1]{}i \textrm{ and } g = \input[s2v2]{}i 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow f = (h\input[s3v1] )i = \input[s3v2]{}i ^2
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \frac{f }{\input[s4v1]{} } = \frac{hi ^2}{h } = i ^2
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now the right hand side can be written as
\[
	\textrm{RHS } = \frac{2 \input[s5v1]{} ^2 - 4 fg + \input[s5v2]{} g ^2}{2 g ^2 - 
4 gh + 2 h ^2}
\]
\[
	\frac{2 (hi ^2)^2 - 4 (hi ^2)hi + 2 (hi )^2}{2 (hi )^2 - 4 (hi )h + 2 h ^2}
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	= \frac{2 h ^2 i ^4 - \input[s6v1]{} h ^2 i ^3 + 2 h ^2 i ^2}{2 h ^2 i ^2 - 4 h ^2 i + \input[s7v2]{} h ^2}
\]
\[
	= \frac{h ^2 i ^2 (2 i ^2 - 4 i + 2 )}{h ^2(2 i ^2 - 4 i + 2 )}
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
\[
	= \input[s7v1]{} ^2
\]"}, {"id": "s8", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
So, from the above two equations, we can write
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \textrm{ RHS}
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "Assuming \frac{f }{g } = \frac{g }{h } = i."}, {"data": ["g", "h"], "text": "$$\text{Taking terms as separate we get $ f = gi $ and $ g = hi $}$$"}, {"data": ["i", "h"], "text": "$$\text{Replacing $g$ with $hi$, we get $f = (hi )i = hi ^2$}$$"}, {"data": ["h"], "text": "$$\text{Dividing the above equations by $ h $, we get $\frac{f }{h } = \frac{hi ^2}{h } = i ^2$}$$"}, {"data": ["f", 2], "text": "$$\text{Replaing $f$ with $(hi^2)$, and $g$ with $(hi)$, we get $\frac{2 (hi ^2)^2 - 4 (hi ^2)hi + 2 (hi )^2}{2 (hi )^2 - 4 (hi )h + 2 h ^2}\$}$$"}, {"data": [4, 2], "text": "$$\text{Upon simplifying the previous equation by opening up the brackets we get $\textrm{RHS } = \frac{h ^2 i ^2 (2 i ^2 - 4 i + 2 )}{h ^2(2 i ^2 - 4 i + 2 )}$}$$"}, {"data": ["i"], "text": "$$\text{The previous equation can be written as $i ^2$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
